scripts.build: npm run build-backend && npm run build-frontend
scripts.build-backend: cd src/backend && npm run build && cd ../../ && mkdir dist -p && cp -r ./src/backend/dist/* ./dist
scripts.build-frontend: cd src/frontend && npm run build && cd ../../ && mkdir dist -p && cp -r ./src/frontend/dist/* ./dist
scripts.install: npm run install-frontend && npm run install-backend
scripts.publish-backend: cd src/backend && npm run publish && cd ../../ && mkdir dist -p && cp -r ./src/backend/dist/* ./dist
scripts.publish-frontend: cd src/frontend && npm run publish && cd ../../ && mkdir dist -p && cp -r ./src/frontend/dist/* ./dist
scripts.publish: npm run publish-backend && npm run publish-frontend
scripts.set-docker-vars: npm config set PACKAGE_VERSION $(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && npm config set DOCKER_TAG brausen42/alexbrausen.com:v$(npm config get PACKAGE_VERSION)
scripts.docker-publish: npm run set-docker-vars && docker build -t $(npm config get DOCKER_TAG) . && docker push $(npm config get DOCKER_TAG)
